item.title: Judge reverses Trump administrationâ€™s cuts of billions of dollars to Harvard University
item.description: A federal judge in Boston has ordered the reversal of over $2.6 billion in federal funding cuts to Harvard University.

item.title: Trump suggests National Guard could go into New Orleans, a blue city in a red state
Texas lawmakers approve letting private citizens sue abortion pill providers
